name: v
description: Simple, fast, safe, compiled language for developing maintainable software. Compiles itself in <1s with zero library dependencies. Supports automatic C => V translation. https://vlang.io

name: ui
description: A cross-platform UI library written in V

name: vinix
description: Vinix is an effort to write a modern, fast, and useful operating system in the V programming language

name: ved
description: 1 MB text editor written in V with hardware accelerated text rendering. Compiles in <1s.

name: gitly
description: Light and fast GitHub/GitLab alternative written in V
